verses.verse: For <WG1063> every <WG3956> high priest <WG749>, being taken <WG2983> from among <WG1537> men <WG444>, is appointed <WG2525> for <WG5228> men <WG444> in <WG2525> things <WG3588> pertaining to <WG4314> God <WG2316>, that <WG2443> he may offer <WG4374> both <WG5037> gifts <WG1435> and <WG2532> sacrifices <WG2378> for <WG5228> sins <WG266>:
